Plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.
Title: Jackie Brown
Writer: Quentin Tarantino (written for the screen by), Elmore Leonard (novel)
Actors: Pam Grier, Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Forster, Bridget Fonda
tomatoConsensus: Tarantino's third film, fashioned as a comeback vehicle for star Pam Grier, offers typical wit and charm -- and is typically overstuffed.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 21 nominations.
